word: H6446 - פַּס - paç - pas - Colours - நிறங்கள்

sections.paragraph: the flat (of the hand or foot), the palm, the sole; used of the tunic reaching to used palms and used soles (figurative)
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From H6461; properly the palm (of the hand) or sole (of the foot), (compare H6447); by implication (plural) a long and sleeved tunic (perhaps simply a wide one; from the original sense of the root, that is, of many breadths): - (divers) colours.
Cognate: H6446, H6451
